languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас не мигая.{/n} "Тебя это удивляет? Напрасно". {n}Несмотря на ледяной тон, сведенные болезненной судорогой скулы Хейнрикса выдают его состояние.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас не мигая.{/n} "Тебя это удивляет? Напрасно". {n}Несмотря на ледяной тон, сведенные болезненной судорогой скулы Хейнрикса выдают его состояние.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix looks at you without blinking.{/n} "Does that surprise you? It shouldn't." {n}Despite his icy tone, the spasms arcing across his face reveal his true state.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente sin pestañear.{/n} «¿Le sorprende? No debería». {n}Pese a su frialdad, las contracciones de sus músculos faciales delatan su verdadero estado de ánimo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you without blinking.{/n} "Does that surprise you? It shouldn't." {n}Despite his icy tone, the spasms arcing across his face reveal his true state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente sin pestañear.{/n} «¿Le sorprende? No debería». {n}Pese a su frialdad, las contracciones de sus músculos faciales delatan su verdadero estado de ánimo.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスはまばたきもせずこちらを見た。{/n}「だから？ そんなに驚くことでもない」{n}氷のような口調とは裏腹に、彼の顔は細かく痙攣している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you without blinking.{/n} "Does that surprise you? It shouldn't." {n}Despite his icy tone, the spasms arcing across his face reveal his true state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスはまばたきもせずこちらを見た。{/n}「だから？ そんなに驚くことでもない」{n}氷のような口調とは裏腹に、彼の顔は細かく痙攣している。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。{/n}“这让你很惊讶吗？这可不应该。”{n}尽管他的语气冰冷，但他脸上的痉挛暴露了他的真实感受。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you without blinking.{/n} "Does that surprise you? It shouldn't." {n}Despite his icy tone, the spasms arcing across his face reveal his true state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着你，眼睛一眨不眨。{/n}“这让你很惊讶吗？这可不应该。”{n}尽管他的语气冰冷，但他脸上的痉挛暴露了他的真实感受。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde sans ciller.{/n} « Cela ne devrait pas vous surprendre. » {n}Malgré son ton glacial, les spasmes qui parcourent son visage révèlent son véritable état intérieur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you without blinking.{/n} "Does that surprise you? It shouldn't." {n}Despite his icy tone, the spasms arcing across his face reveal his true state.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous regarde sans ciller.{/n} « Cela ne devrait pas vous surprendre. » {n}Malgré son ton glacial, les spasmes qui parcourent son visage révèlent son véritable état intérieur.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix blickt dich an, ohne zu blinzeln.{/n} "Überrascht Euch das? Das sollte es nicht." {n}Sein Ton ist eisig, doch die Zuckungen, die über sein Gesicht huschen, offenbaren seinen wahren Gemütszustand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you without blinking.{/n} "Does that surprise you? It shouldn't." {n}Despite his icy tone, the spasms arcing across his face reveal his true state.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gözünü bile kırpmadan sana bakıyor.{/n} "Şaşırdın mı? Şaşırma." {n}Soğuk ses tonuna rağmen yüzündeki kasılmalar, asıl duygularını ele veriyor.{/n}
